title: Java Basics - Printing & Simple I/O
concept: In this level you will learn the basic structure of a Java program, using main method, printing with System.out.println, and reading simple input using Scanner. Focus on exact output format without extra text.

challenges.title: Hello, Java!
Welcome Line
Print With Quotes
challenges.description: Print the text including double quotes: "Learning Java"

challenges.title: Two Lines
challenges.description: Print Hello on first line and Java on second line.

challenges.title: Greet by Name
challenges.description: Read a name and print: Hello <name>

challenges.title: Add Two Numbers
challenges.description: Read two integers and print their sum.

challenges.title: Multiply Two Numbers
challenges.description: Read two integers and print their product.

challenges.title: Square of a Number
challenges.description: Read an integer n and print its square.

challenges.title: Simple Interest
challenges.description: Read principal P, rate R and time T (in years), compute simple interest = (P*R*T)/100 and print the value. You can print int or double.
challenges.inputDescription: Three numbers P R T separated by space.

challenges.title: Formatted Message
challenges.description: Read a name and an integer age, then print exactly: <name> is <age> years old
examples:
Input:
Ram 20
Output:
Ram is 20 years old
